Author: lowkeydyingbutitsok
Text: I just gained 5lbs after a 2 days of binging and lost it all and more after a few days of restricting! Unless you were eating 8,000 calories over your TDEE every day, it’s definitely just water weight. I’ve noticed that the more I restrict, the more easily weight I gain when I eat, even if it’s just a little. I’ve also noticed that when I do binge, the weight goes away after a few days of restricting.   I D K. I gain 1lb from eating 1/2 a pack of ramen and it should be literally impossible to gain weight from that but also StArVatION MoDE
